actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations

official_title: A bill for the relief of Rolen-Rolen-Roberts International of Knoxville, Tennessee.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named corporation in full satisfaction of its claims against the United States arising out of its preparation of a proposal in response to a Department of Commerce solicitation, later cancelled, for management services for an exhibition in Beijing, People's Republic of China.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Rolen-Rolen-Roberts International of Knoxville, Tennessee.
